register.name: CNTFRQ
register.description: This register is provided so that software can discover the frequency of the system counter. It must be programmed with this value as part of system initialization. The value of the register is not interpreted by hardware.

register.name: CNTHCTL
register.description: Controls the generation of an event stream from the physical counter, and access from Non-secure EL1 modes to the physical counter and the Non-secure EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: Selects which bit (0 to 15) of the counter register CNTPCT is the trigger for the event stream generated from that counter, when that stream is enabled.

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the counter register CNTPCT trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event when the event stream is enabled:

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the counter register CNTPCT:

bitField.name: PL1PCEN
bitField.description: Traps Non-secure EL0 and EL1 accesses to the physical timer registers to Hyp mode.

bitField.name: PL1PCTEN
bitField.description: Traps Non-secure EL0 and EL1 accesses to the physical counter register to Hyp mode.

register.name: CNTHP_CTL
register.gui_name: Counter-timer Hyp Physical Timer Control register
register.description: Control register for the Hyp mode physical timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: CNTHP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the Hyp mode physical timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL2 physical timer CompareValue.

register.name: CNTHP_TVAL
register.gui_name: Counter-timer Hyp Physical Timer TimerValue register
register.description: Holds the timer value for the Hyp mode physical timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the EL2 physical timer.

register.name: CNTHV_CTL
register.description: Provides AArch32 access to the control register for the EL2 virtual timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: CNTHV_CVAL
register.description: Provides AArch32 access to the compare value for the EL2 virtual timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL2 virtual timer CompareValue.

register.name: CNTHV_TVAL
register.description: Provides AArch32 access to the timer value for the EL2 virtual timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the EL2 virtual timer.

register.name: CNTKCTL
register.description: Controls the generation of an event stream from the virtual counter, and access from EL0 modes to the physical counter, virtual counter, EL1 physical timers, and the virtual timer.

bitField.name: PL0PTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the physical timer registers to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: PL0VTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the virtual timer registers to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: Selects which bit (0 to 15) of the counter register CNTVCT is the trigger for the event stream generated from that counter, when that stream is enabled.

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the counter register CNTVCT trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event when the event stream is enabled:

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the counter register CNTVCT:

bitField.name: PL0VCTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the frequency register and virtual counter register to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: PL0PCTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the frequency register and physical counter register to Undefined mode.

register.name: CNTPCT
register.description: Holds the 64-bit physical count value.

register.name: CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: S_CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: N_CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL1 physical timer CompareValue.

register.name: S_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL1 physical timer CompareValue.

register.name: N_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL1 physical timer CompareValue.

register.name: CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: S_CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: N_CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: CNTVCT
register.description: Holds the 64-bit virtual count value. The virtual count value is equal to the physical count value visible in CNTPCT minus the virtual offset visible in CNTVOFF.

register.name: CNTVOFF
register.description: Holds the 64-bit virtual offset. This is the offset between the physical count value visible in CNTPCT and the virtual count value visible in CNTVCT.

register.name: CNTV_CTL
register.description: Control register for the virtual timer.

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer.

bitField.name: IMASK
bitField.description: Timer interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables the timer.

register.name: CNTV_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the virtual timer.

bitField.name: CompareValue
bitField.description: Holds the EL1 virtual timer CompareValue.

register.name: CNTV_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the virtual timer.

bitField.name: TimerValue
bitField.description: The TimerValue view of the virtual timer.

tcf:enumItem.description: A 0 to 1 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_0_to_1_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: A 1 to 0 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_1_to_0_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: Disables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Disables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: Enables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Enables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure EL0 and EL1 accesses to the CNTP_CTL, CNTP_CVAL, and CNTP_TVAL are trapped to Hyp mode, unless the it is trapped by CNTKCTL.PL0PTEN.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_EL0_and_EL1_accesses_to_the_CNTP_CTL_CNTP_CVAL_and_CNTP_TVAL_are_trapped_to_Hyp_mode_unless_the_it_is_trapped_by_CNTKCTL

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure EL0 and EL1 accesses to the CNTPCT are trapped to Hyp mode, unless it is trapped by CNTKCTL.PL0PCTEN.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_EL0_and_EL1_accesses_to_the_CNTPCT_are_trapped_to_Hyp_mode_unless_it_is_trapped_by_CNTKCTL

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is met.

tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_interrupt_is_masked_by_the_IMASK_bit
